headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official
summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.6% on Monday, March 31, boosted by an afternoon rally even as investors brace for the planned onset of reciprocal tariffs later this week.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official
raw.summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.6% on Monday, March 31, boosted by an afternoon rally even as investors brace for the planned onset of reciprocal tariffs later this week.

headline: Moderna (MRNA) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of biotechnology company Moderna (NASDAQ:MRNA) fell 12.5% in the morning session after Peter Marks, the head of the FDA's Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research (CBER), resigned on Friday, 28 March 2025. Marks noted his departure was related to "misinformation and lies" around immunization and raised concerns about the Trump administration's ability to "swiftly approve critical vaccines."

raw.headline: Moderna (MRNA) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
raw.summary: Shares of biotechnology company Moderna (NASDAQ:MRNA) fell 12.5% in the morning session after Peter Marks, the head of the FDA's Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research (CBER), resigned on Friday, 28 March 2025. headline: Vaccine stocks tumble: Moderna, Novavax, Pfizer fall after top FDA official resigns over RFK Jr. anti-vax views
summary: The health agency’s top immunization official announced the move Monday in protest, citing Secretary Kennedy’s ‘misinformation and lies.’

headline: Why Moderna Stock Is Plummeting Today
summary: Shares of Moderna (NASDAQ: MRNA) are falling on Monday.  The steep decline comes as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite lost 0.4% and 1.1%, respectively.  The vaccine maker's shares tumbled following the resignation of a key U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) official who oversaw vaccine approvals.

headline: Moderna, Rocket, Hut 8: Market Minute
summary: Julie Hyman outlines the trending stories of the trading day on Market Minute. Moderna (MRNA) shares are falling after a top vaccine official from the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) resigned. Rocket (RKT) is acquiring Mr. Cooper (COOP) for $9.4 billion. Bitcoin (BTC=F) miner Hut 8 (HUT) is in focus on an announcement that it is partnering with the Trump family. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Moderna Stock Falls as FDA Vaccine Chief Resigns, Citing RFK Jr.'s 'Misinformation'
summary: Shares of Moderna and other vaccine makers dropped Monday after the Food and Drug Administration's vaccine chief, Peter Marks, said he would resign, citing conflicts with Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Mr. Cooper, Nvidia, Newsmax, Moderna
summary: ? Rocket (RKT): The mortgage company agreed to buy Mr. Cooper (COOP) for $9.4 billion in an all-stock deal. Rocket shares dropped nearly 7% Monday morning, while those in the target jumped 17%. ↘️ Nvidia (NVDA): The AI chip stock sold off, as did shares of CoreWeave (CRWV), the Nvidia-backed startup that went public last week.

headline: Moderna and other vaccines stocks are down after the FDA's top vaccine official resigns
summary: Moderna (MRNA) and other vaccine maker stocks plummeted during pre-market trading on Monday amid news from this weekend that the Food and Drug Administration’s (FDA) top vaccine regulator was forced out of the agency.

headline: Moderna shares drop amid FDA leadership change
summary: Moderna (MRNA) shares dropped nearly 12% following news that FDA official Peter Marks will step down on April 5th, causing uncertainty in the biotech sector, particularly for vaccine makers. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Anjalee Khemlani joins Morning Brief to discuss how this leadership change could impact companies like Moderna, Novavax (NVAX), and others in the healthcare industry. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Moderna, Novavax Stocks Fall After Top FDA Vaccine Official Forced Out
summary: Shares in Moderna and Novavax fell Monday, following a Wall Street Journal report that the Food and Drug Administration’s top vaccine official has been pushed out. Shares in some larger drugmakers, such as GSK, also retreated.
